name: speakr
description: Speakr is a self-hosted text-to-speech service with a web UI for entering text and generating audio files. It can integrate into other apps via a simple HTTP API.
features: Text-to-speech: Converts text into natural-sounding speech audio.
Multiple voices: Offers various voice options with different accents and styles.
Language support: Generates speech in multiple languages.
Audio export: Downloads generated speech as MP3 or WAV files.
SSML support: Uses Speech Synthesis Markup Language for advanced control.
Pronunciation control: Adjusts pronunciation of specific words or phrases.
Speed adjustment: Controls speech rate from slow to fast.
Pitch control: Modifies voice pitch for different effects.
Web interface: Generates speech through simple browser interface.
API access: Integrates TTS into applications via HTTP API.
Batch processing: Converts multiple text inputs to audio files.
Preview playback: Listens to generated speech before downloading.
